thread.title: G11n Selected to Present at Venture Atlanta 2015
thread.title_full: G11n Selected to Present at Venture Atlanta 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: G11n Selected to Present at Venture Atlanta 2015
text:
Presenting companies highlight strength of Georgia’s technology community and further position the state as a hotbed of entrepreneurial activity and innovation
Atlanta, Georgia (PRWEB) September 16, 2015
g11n today announced that it has been selected as a presenter at Venture Atlanta 2015, Georgia’s premier event connecting technology innovation and investment capital, to be held October 20-21 at the Georgia Aquarium. The 32 early and later stage companies chosen to present reflect a wide range of technologies and diverse markets, while highlighting the innovation of Georgia businesses.
g11n is a globalization enablement company providing a revolutionary platform to simplify and accelerate global expansion strategies. Our platform simplifies multilingual product translation, standardizes global brand language, automates localization testing and integrates global recruitment and training.
Darshana Patel, CEO, g11n
“Our company motto is to simlify the globalization problem, a issue which is often an afterthought for most companies. Being selected by Venture Atlanta proves that the trend is shifting and global offerings are become a priority for both startups and multinationals.”
Presenting companies and conference attendees will have numerous opportunities to network with regional and national venture capitalists and investors during the two-day event. Now entering its 14th year, Venture Atlanta has helped local companies raise more than $1.5 billion – a number that continues to grow. The conference provides an invaluable experience for entrepreneurs, resulting in funding, national investor exposure, unparalleled relationship building, and mentoring by successful technology executives.
Philip Lewis, Principal, Fulcrum Equity Partners
“This year was one of the most competitive processes the Venture Atlanta selection committee has ever gone through,” said Philip Lewis, principal at Fulcrum Equity Partners. “The companies that made the final roster for 2015 represent some of the highest quality businesses the conference has ever showcased.”
“Venture Atlanta is the foremost showcase for growing companies in Georgia,” said Philip Lewis, principal at Fulcrum Equity Partners. “Between these great companies and the quality of and turnout for this year’s event, Venture Atlanta 2015 should go down as the best year in the conference’s storied history.”
To learn more about g11n visit http://www.g11n.com For additional information about Venture Atlanta or to view the conference schedule, please visit http://www.ventureatlanta.org .
About g11n
g11n products and solutions address the global /multilingual release and launch issues: our platform simplifies multilingual product translation, standardizes global brand language, automates localization testing and integrates global recruitment and training. We provide a comprehensive view across the globalization portfolio with metrics, adoption and investment information integrated into an actionable dashboard.
For more information, visit http://www.g11n.com . For updates, join us on LinkedIn,
About Venture Atlanta
Venture Atlanta, Georgia's technology innovation event, is where the state’s best technology innovators meet the country's top-tier investors. As the region’s largest investor showcase, Venture Atlanta connects local entrepreneurs with venture capitalists, bankers, angel investors and others who can help them raise the capital they need to grow their businesses. The annual non-profit event is a collaboration of three leading Georgia business organizations: Atlanta CEO Council, Metro Atlanta Chamber and the Technology Association of Georgia (TAG).
